text:
I recently visited this place to get my drug fix and was thoroughly disappointed with my experience.

The staff was incredibly rude and unprofessional.

Not only did they fail to assist me with my queries, but they also had the audacity to tell me off. Their attitude was completely unacceptable, and it made what should have been a simple shopping trip extremely unpleasant. Even though it's cheaper to purchase here than at stores outside, it's not worth the experience at all.

I would NOT recommend this store to anyone. It's clear they don't value their customers or their business.

The staff were incredibly kind and helpful with all of my questions.

I highly recommend visiting here. The prices were very affordable compared to other stores. I will definitely be returning in the future. Thank you!
Great pharmacy that's so well stocked - deceptive. And staff really helpful.

Just beware if you are looking to buy doctorâ€™s prescriptions from this store. They may not be qualified to do so.

When brought upon our prescriptions to them, they instead tried recommending another medicine and remarked that the doctor may have written the prescription incorrectly. Luckily we instead headed towards a qualified pharmacist and they had promptly assisted us on dispensing the medicine and verified the prescription by the doctor professionally.

I sincerely hope that if the staffs are not qualified to provide prescription medicine, just say so and not misled and try selling other products to your customers. On extreme cases, it could be life threatening!
Staff very friendly,  even almost closing time, has Savlon antiseptic cream which is not available at Guardian/ Watson/ Unity,.
